CustomField.formula:
IF( previousStep__c = 'Risk Assessment',
( 24 * ( ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( newStepDateTime__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD( DATEVALUE( newStepDateTime__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7) + MIN( 1, 24 / 24 * ( MOD( newStepDateTime__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 12:00:00' ), 1 ) ) ) ) ) - ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( specification__r.qualityEngineerReviewDate__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE( specification__r.qualityEngineerReviewDate__c ) - DATE( 1996, 1, 1), 7 ) + MIN( 1, 24 / 24 * ( MOD( specification__r.qualityEngineerReviewDate__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 12:00:00' ), 1) ) ) ) ) ))
,0)
CustomField.label: PE Risk Duration (Hours)
